sentences.en: AAR can be assorted two classifications: Alkali - Silica Reaction ( ASR ) and Alkali - Carbonate Reaction ( ACR ).
sentences.cn: AAR主要 分两类: 碱 - 硅酸反应(Alkali-Silica Reaction, 简称 ASR ) 和碱 - 碳酸盐反应 ( Alkali-CarbonateReaction,简称ACR ).

sentences.en: After seeing how this air makes the ugly sagebrush and the patches of alkali and brown earth a feast to the eye, one can understand how the light of heaven may make the ugliest faces beautiful.
sentences.cn: 这儿的空气能使丑陋的灌木和斑驳的盐碱地、褐色的泥土变成视觉盛宴。 只要见过这些，你就明白为什么说天堂的圣光能让最丑的脸变得美好。

sentences.en: All the alkali metals have a single s - electron outside a closed shell.
sentences.cn: 所有的碱金属都在闭合壳层之外有一单个S电子.

sentences.en: Carbon dioxide is reported to absorb primarily onto surface alkali or alkali - containing constituents.
sentences.cn: 据报道CO2吸附主要在碱性表面或含碱成分的表面上.

sentences.en: Cyclization occurs readily with dilute alkali.
sentences.cn: 遇到稀碱就容易环化.

sentences.en: It is a tribute to the capacity of the kidneys to excrete alkali.
sentences.cn: 这对肾脏排碱功能是个负担.

sentences.en: It was surprising when the alkali spectra showed unmistakable doublets.
sentences.cn: 当碱金属光谱显示出不容怀疑的双线结构时,是令人惊奇的.

sentences.en: PC board ban and wet cement appearance and acid, alkali touch information appearance.
sentences.cn: PC板禁令和湿水泥外表和酸，碱性资料外表触摸。

sentences.en: Such detergents do not yellow the wool as alkali tends to do.
sentences.cn: 这种洗涤剂不会象碱那样使羊毛发黄.

sentences.en: The acid and alkali are combined into salt.
sentences.cn: 酸与碱化合成盐.

sentences.en: The alkali halides can be grown into large crystals of excellent transparency.
sentences.cn: 硷金属卤化物能生长成具有优良透明性的大晶体.

sentences.en: The article introduces the application of fixed ammonia alkali additive decomposition equipment on coking wastewater.
sentences.cn: 文章着重介绍了固定氨加碱分解装置在焦化废水中的应用。

sentences.en: The extremely salty, alkali lake holds little life, but its waters are a favorite spot for wading birds.
sentences.cn: 其味极咸，碱湖保存了湖中的小生命，但其水域仍为涉水鸟所喜欢的地方。

sentences.en: The free alkali metals react immediately with water to liberate hydrogen.
sentences.cn: 游离的碱金属直接和水中作用,放出氢气.

sentences.en: The goods are rinsed with hot and cold water to remove residual alkali.
sentences.cn: 产品用热水和冷水漂洗,以除去残留的碱.

sentences.en: The nitrocellulose filters are then placed on wet filter paper containing alkali, which denatures the DNA.
sentences.cn: 再将硝酸纤维素滤膜置于含碱的湿滤纸上, 碱的作用是使DNA变性.

sentences.en: The valence atom of an alkali - metal atom has two states.
sentences.cn: 碱金属原子的价原子具有两种能态.

sentences.en: This paper deals with the alkali treatment affect for ramie yarn and ramie / cotton yarn in order to improve their elasticity.
sentences.cn: 本文主要为了改善苎麻纱和麻棉纱的弹性，对苎麻纱、麻棉纱和棉纱进行了碱处理。

sentences.en: To get similar characteristics from composites, the carbon fibres are first chemically treated with an alkali which creates lots of tiny pits on their surface.
sentences.cn: 为了在复合碳材料上获取与电容器相似的性质，这种碳纤维首先经过碱化学处理以令其表面生成许多细微的凹点。

sentences.en: Water, acrylonitrile and the galactomannan gum are added to a reactor with an alkali metal hydroxide.
sentences.cn: 水 、 丙烯晴和半乳甘露聚糖胶,同碱金属氢氧化物在一起,加入到反应器中.

sentences.en: When alkali is added to such compounds a series of proton dissociations occurs.
sentences.cn: 当碱加到这类化合物中,将发生一系列质子离解作用.

words.tran_cn: [化学] 碱度；[化学] 碱性

phrases.tran_cn: 抗碱性，耐碱性；耐碱坚牢度

trans.tran_en: a substance that forms a chemical salt when combined with an acid
